QuestData.Title: Champions of the Amathet
QuestData.Description:
The soldiers of Ramkahen are hearty and reliable.
I would stand them up against any footman of the Amathet, but some of their higher-caste fighters are too much for even our toughest to handle.
I don't think they'd be a problem for you, though. It would be a boon to our defense efforts if you could handle them while my soldiers engage the rank and file.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa elite Amathet enemies in Uldum.
